article.title: BAE Wins UK Royal Navy Ship Development Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The United Kingdom's Ministry of Defence has awarded BAE Systems a 3.5 million pound contract to reduce the risk in the Royal Navy's Future Surface Combatant (FSC) program by allowing the joint project team toÂ develop a better view of costs, schedules and design at an earlier stage than previous programs.
